heading: PTR Patch 2.0 is up!
content: The Diablo 4 PTR Patch 2.0 is now up for everyone to play and test! We hope you enjoy the Season of the Infernal Hordes with the aid of our guides. The is always monitoring Diablo 4 and Season 5 metagame to bring you the most updated content and build guides. Our focus is now on the PTR 2.0 and Vessel of Hatred and the will provide you with the most accurate resources and guides out there! We're continuing to work on more updates for With that said, head over to our to stay up to date with our content development and to make the most of your Season 5 experience! Also don't forget to check out our Written by:
